# gr11prctl

A Python library containing practical programs for Grade 11.

## Installation
```bash
pip install git+https://github.com/TanujairamV/gr11prctl.git
```

## Usage
```python
import gr11prctl
gr11prctl.code()  # Displays available programs
```

## Author
[Tanujairam](https://github.com/TanujairamV)
